title: Chunky, Round fonts
content:
Hey,

This is my first post on this forum, and i was just wondering if anyone knows of some (free) fonts, similar to [Bifurk](http://web.archive.org/web/20090925172651/http:/www.dafont.com/bifurk.font)? Not exactly the same, but similar. Possibly a tad more rounded?

Many thanks!  
Joe
author: ipod

comments.content:
It’s not free, but check out P22’s Constructivist Pro set

[http://p22.com/products/constructivist\_pro.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20090925172651/http:/p22.com/products/constructivist_pro.html "http://p22.com/products/constructivist\_pro.html")

Hi Joe,

check out Stephen’s [Famous Fat Font Fad Farrago](http://web.archive.org/web/20090925172651/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42643).  
F
